_sText:
surf_amir
Tier 2/3 | Linear | 1 Bonus | Skill surf

Counter-strike:Source version, click here for CS:GO version.

Here's a little side project I've been working on for some time, which I have been excited to release for the public.
It has been tested with 400 airacceleration on CS:S.

Not recommended for beginner servers.

Keep in mind that it is not exactly the same as the CS:GO version. I had to use different textures, and change/remove some stuff for it to work.

Here's an old video showing off the main map from CS:GO:


Hope you enjoy!

Unpack the .rar file here:
C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Counter-Strike Global Offensive\csgo\maps
